channel.title: How to get free stuff from microsoft
channel.description:
Microsoft has launched a new thing called the Live! Club. Basically you play games and earn tickets which you can use to get prizes. It's 100% free and does actually work
Link: http://club.live.com
For bots and cheats for the games please read: http://forums.facepunchstudios.com/showthread.php?t=363381
About the ship dates and shipping times, they lie. It takes MUCH less time.

item.title: How to get free stuff from microsoft
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:63, topic:118794”]2nd question was pointed towards the macro sry

thx I found it…man they sure hid it…[/quote]

Hmm, I haven’t experienced your problem. However, you gotta keep the mouse on the flash object for the macro to work.

And yea, the black looks so much sexier, no?

@xxlegitxx wrote:

item.title: How to get free stuff from microsoft
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“wi-fi23, post:42, topic:118794”]OH weird. Well thats a really good idea. Dont they take a long time to ship to i ordered just a ring tone or whatever to test it out it says its shipping on 9/22/07 wtf ups with that?

And what r u gonna do with 50 zunes? .lol. sell em right?[/quote]

Apparently they do take a long time to ship. Hopefully they lie and they’ll ship the stuff to me by tomorrow. No idea how they would ‘ship’ a ring tone though. I ordered a Zune, the expensive headset, then the cheaper headset (because the reviews said this one was way better), and a webcam. I still have like 30k spread out over a couple accounts, don’t know what to buy.

item.source: How to get free stuff from microsoft

item.title: How to get free stuff from microsoft
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“wi-fi23, post:40, topic:118794”]Here is the limit of the points per day if anyone was wondering.

Chicktionary - 1000
Clink - 2900
Crosswire - 1960
Dingbats - 987
Elvis = Lives - 1176
Flexicon - 9525
Red Carpet Reveal - 530
Seekadoo - 4335

Total = 22403[/quote]

It’s not per day. It’s the most per game you can get. Period. The software is a bit buggy, thats why you didn’t get a full 10k for flexicon, etc. For Chicktionary, I have no clue why you can’t get a full 7k. Possibly they reduced the max points.

Either way, the max points you can get adds up to below the amount of the Xbox 360 Pro Bundle. So meanwhile, I’m creating 50 accounts and getting 50 Zunes.

Read full topic
